query: We require a travel plan for a party of 3, departing from Washington and planning to visit 3 cities in California over a period of 7 days, from March 22nd to March 28th, 2022. We have a budget of $12,400. It's important that our accommodations are child-friendly as we will have children under the age of 10. We prefer entire rooms and we are not planning to drive ourselves during the trip.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Los Angeles,Bakersfield,San Francisco]
